channel.title: XMLUI Blog
channel.description: Latest updates, tutorials, and insights for XMLUI - the declarative UI framework. Stay informed about new features, best practices, and community highlights.

item.title: Welcome to the XMLUI blog!
item.description: In this inaugural post we'll explore the development of the blog engine we're using on this site. Our tagline is Practical User Interfaces Built Simply and creating this blog couldn't have been simpler. The whole site, of which the blog is now a part...
item.author: support@xmlui.org (Jon Udell)
